title: LF decent duo partner or a 5 man team to play with
body: Hey everybody, I'm currently s4 and been bouncing between s5 and s2 just stuck here lol. Basically none of my friends play LoL anymore and trying to get some new people to play and climb with. I can play any role but am probably best at top and ADC. Also wanna try playing some pre made 5s bc I haven't done that in forever and that was the most fun I've had playing league. Hit me up if you wanna play!

replies.body: hey man add Kairutox hes looking for some players.
